defs: = ಕಲ್ನಾಟುಗೊಡು.
to plant a stone in memory of a hero.
a stone planted in memory of a hero.
an extent of land given as a gift to the family of a hero who died in a war.
to plant a stone in memory of a hero and give an endowment of land to his family.

to plant a stone (esp. one inscribed on).
(Jain.) a standing on a rock in a hot summer, for making religious penance and meditating.
to stand on a rock in hot summer and meditate, as a penance.
a commandment or direction meant as a rule of action or conduct ; a precept.
a minor scripture that deals with the rules for ceremonial acts or sacrifices.
one of the eighteen traditional writings or scriptures of Hindus.
a measure of time, as a day of the universe; (myth.) a period of thousand yugas (eras) (4,320 million years).
a thing or option chosen in place of another.
(myth.) the Final Deluge, at the final destruction of the universe.
medical treatment of the sick.
the wish-yielding tree of the Heaven.
(Jain.) one of the sixteen heavens.
(Jain.) a cycle of duration which includes universal progression and retrogression.
one of the four kinds of sacred ash.
(dial.) the skill in deception; craftiness.
that can be imagined; imaginable.
having the capacity to imagine.
he who makes, constructs or builds; a maker; a builder.
a ceremonial or formal or solemn act, observance or procedure in accordance with prescribed rule or custom, as in religious use; a rite.
(dial.) a man who cuts and dresses other's hair; a barber.
a kind, merciful man.

imagination - a) the act or power of forming mental images of what is not actually present, b) the act or power of creating mental images of what has never been actually experienced or of creating new images or ideas by combining previous experiences; creative power.

a measure of time, as a day of the universe; (myth.) a period of thousand yugas (eras).

ಕಲ್ಲಾಗು kallāgu to become tough, hardened; 2. to become merciless; ಕಲ್ಲಾಗು ಕಷ್ಟದಡಿ kallāgu kaṣṭadaḍi be a camel in the desert of life; ಕಲ್ಲಿನ ಹಾಗೆ ಇರು kallina hāge iru = ಕಲ್ಲಾಗು; ಕಲ್ಲು ಇದ್ದಾಗ ನಾಯಿ ಇಲ್ಲ, ನಾಯಿ ಇದ್ದಾಗ ಕಲ್ಲು ಇಲ್ಲ kallu iddāga nāyi illa, nāyi iddāga kallu illa when the cage is ready the bird is flown; ಕಲ್ಲು ಹಾಕು kallu hāku to lay a foundation; 2. (fig.) to spoil another's plan; ಕಲ್ಲು ಹೃದಯ kallu hřdaya (fig.) the quality of being very unfeeling and lacking in pity, kindness, etc; ಕಲ್ಲು ಗುದ್ದಿ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ತೆಗೆ kallu guddi eṇṇe tege (fig.) (said of a young man) to be full of vigour, strongly built as to be able to accomplish hardest work; ಕಲ್ಲಪ್ಪನೂ ಗುಂಡಪ್ಪನೂ ಸೇರಿದರೆ, ಮೆಣಸಪ್ಪ ಪುಡಿ kallappanū guṇḍappanū sēridare, meṇasappa puḍi when two strong persons fight against a weak one, it is the weak who suffers; when elephants fight, the mousedeer between them is killed; ಕಲ್ಲು ನೆನೆದರೆ ಮೆತ್ತಗಾಗುತ್ತದೆಯೇ? kallu nenedare mettagāguttadeyē? it is difficult to get rid of inborn habits; bad habits die hard; ತನ್ನ ಕಾಲಮೇಲೆ ತಾನೇ ಕಲ್ಲು ಹಾಕಿಕೊ tanna kālamēle tānē kallu hākiko to do somethig which is going to cause trouble for oneself; ಒಂದೇ ಕಲ್ಲಿನಿಂದ ಎರಡು ಹಕ್ಕಿ ಹೊಡೆ ondē kallininda eraḍu hakki hoḍe to achieve two aims at once by means of the same action; to kill two birds with one stone.
